products.title: Classic Margherita Pizza
products.description: Indulge in our classic Margherita pizza, crafted with a thin, crispy crust, topped with fresh tomatoes, creamy mozzarella, fragrant basil, and a drizzle of premium olive oil.

products.title: Russian Borscht
products.description: Enjoy our Russian Borscht, a hearty beet soup with cabbage, potatoes, carrots, and onions, finished with a touch of vinegar. Served with sour cream and fresh dill, it's a comforting and vibrant dish.

products.title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
products.description: Delight in our creamy Chicken Alfredo Pasta, featuring tender grilled chicken breast tossed with fettuccine in a rich, velvety Alfredo sauce, garnished with freshly grated Parmesan cheese and parsley.

products.title: Chicken Biryani
products.description: Experience the rich flavors of our Chicken Biryani, a fragrant basmati rice dish layered with tender, marinated chicken, aromatic spices, and fresh herbs, served with a side of cooling raita.

products.title: Mango Salsa Chicken
products.description: Enjoy our zesty Mango Salsa Chicken, featuring juicy grilled chicken breast topped with a vibrant, tangy mango salsa, served with a side of seasoned rice and fresh vegetables.

products.title: Quinoa Salad with Avocado
products.description: Relish our refreshing Quinoa Salad with Avocado, a nutritious blend of fluffy quinoa, ripe avocado, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, and mixed greens, all tossed in a light, zesty vinaigrette.

products.title: Tomato Basil Bruschetta
products.description: Savor our classic Tomato Basil Bruschetta, featuring toasted baguette slices topped with a fresh mixture of diced tomatoes, fragrant basil, garlic, and a drizzle of balsamic glaze.

products.title: Caprese Salad
products.description: Indulge in our Caprese Salad, a delightful combination of ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, and fragrant basil leaves, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil and a touch of balsamic reduction.

products.title: Shrimp Scampi Pasta
products.description: Treat yourself to our Shrimp Scampi Pasta, featuring succulent shrimp saut√©ed in a garlic butter and white wine sauce, tossed with al dente pasta and garnished with fresh parsley and a hint of lemon zest.

products.title: Aloo Keema
products.description: Delight in our Aloo Keema, a flavorful dish of minced meat cooked with tender potatoes, aromatic spices, and fresh herbs, served with warm naan or steamed rice for a hearty and satisfying meal.

products.title: Saag (Spinach) with Makki di Roti
products.description: Experience the traditional taste of Saag (Spinach) with Makki di Roti, a comforting dish featuring creamy, slow-cooked spinach seasoned with a blend of spices, served alongside warm, golden cornmeal flatbreads.

products.title: Japanese Ramen Soup
products.description: Enjoy our authentic Japanese Ramen Soup, a savory and comforting bowl of rich, flavorful broth, tender noodles, and an assortment of toppings such as sliced pork, soft-boiled eggs, nori, and fresh vegetables, garnished with green onions and a dash of sesame seeds.

products.title: Butter Chicken
products.description: Savor the rich and creamy flavors of our Butter Chicken, a classic Indian dish featuring tender pieces of chicken simmered in a velvety tomato-based sauce, infused with aromatic spices and finished with a touch of butter and cream. Enjoy it with warm naan or fragrant basmati rice for a truly indulgent meal.

products.title: Italian Tiramisu
products.description: Indulge in our classic Italian Tiramisu, a luscious dessert made with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers, creamy mascarpone cheese, and a dusting of rich cocoa powder. This delightful treat is the perfect balance of sweetness and coffee flavor, making it an elegant and satisfying end to any meal.

products.title: Mango Lassi
products.description: Refresh yourself with our Mango Lassi, a delightful and creamy Indian beverage made from ripe mangoes, smooth yogurt, a touch of sugar, and a hint of cardamom. This chilled drink is perfect for quenching your thirst and adding a sweet, tropical twist to your day.

products.title: Lebanese Falafel Wrap
products.description: Treat yourself to our Lebanese Falafel Wrap, a delicious and wholesome meal featuring crispy, golden-brown falafel made from ground chickpeas and fresh herbs, wrapped in warm pita bread. This wrap is complemented with a medley of fresh vegetables, tangy pickles, and a drizzle of creamy tahini sauce, offering a perfect balance of flavors and textures in every bite.
